snippet: After sustaining an injury in August, Evan Lysacek’s chances of defending his Olympic figure skating goal medal are in jeopardy.
lead_paragraph: After sustaining an injury in August, Evan Lysacek’s chances of defending his Olympic figure skating goal medal are in jeopardy.

headline.main: Lysacek’s Bid for Sochi Is Running Way Behind
headline.print_headline: Lysacek’s Bid for Sochi Is Running Way Behind
